FilterItemPortable.Name: Em aberto e por período
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">A.EMABERTO = 'S'</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>true</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="DATAEMISSAO"> <FieldDefinitionName>DateTimeFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>maior ou igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>true</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="3" FieldName="DATAEMISSAO"> <FieldDefinitionName>DateTimeFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>menor ou igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator><=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>true</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="4" FieldName="DOCUMENTODIGITADO"> <FieldDefinitionName>StringFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>contém</Name> <DatabaseOperator>LIKE</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> <ValueSubstitutionPattern>%{0}%</ValueSubstitutionPattern> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string"></Value> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Liquidado e por período
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">A.EMABERTO = 'N'</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>true</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="DATAEMISSAO"> <FieldDefinitionName>DateTimeFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>maior ou igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>true</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="3" FieldName="DATAEMISSAO"> <FieldDefinitionName>DateTimeFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>menor ou igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator><=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>true</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="4" FieldName="DOCUMENTODIGITADO"> <FieldDefinitionName>StringFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string"></Value> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Vencidos
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">A.HANDLE IN(SELECT X.DOCUMENTO FROM FN_DOCUMENTOS D, FN_PARCELAS X, Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS U WHERE D.HANDLE = X.DOCUMENTO AND D.PESSOA = U.PESSOA AND X.VALORESBAIXADOS < X.VALOR AND X.VCTOPRORROGADO < @HOJE)</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>true</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>A.HANDLE IN(SELECT X.DOCUMENTO FROM FN_DOCUMENTOS D, FN_PARCELAS X, Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS U WHERE D.HANDLE = X.DOCUMENTO AND D.PESSOA = U.PESSOA AND X.VALORESBAIXADOS < X.VALOR AND X.VCTOPRORROGADO < @HOJE)</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>
